description.description: A short description of the project

repo.description: The URL of the repo this project is part of

documentation.description: Link to the documentation of this project

cluster.description: Path to a .yaml cluster configuration file (relative to the project root)

environment.description: The environment that needs to be set up to run the project

dockerimage.description: URL to a docker image that can be pulled to run the project in

dockerfile.description: Path to a Dockerfile to set up an image the project can run in (relative to the project root)

requirements.description: Path to a Python requirements.txt file to set up project dependencies (relative to the project root)

shell.description: A sequence of shell commands to run to set up the project environment

items.description: Possible commands to run to start a session

command.description: Shell command to run on the cluster

choices.description: Possible values the parameter can take

tmux.description: If true, the command will be run inside of tmux
